p: The antibodies in the CP could potentially limit the viral replication, can mediate cellular toxicity and/or phagocytosis, and the plasma components can exert vital clinical effects such as replacing the coagulation factors, complement activation. Also, CP may potentially offer the only short-term strategy to confer immediate immunity to infection susceptible patients [ 53]. In the absence of an effective specific treatment for COVID-19, clinicians across the globe have used the CP with varying success [ 54, 55].
